body_html: @ericox Merging the JSON data is unlikely to be a good idea... it is much simpler for the master to just collect the StepStats protobufs from each worker and merge the protos (which is a single line of code!) The Timeline code ought to just deal with the merged StepStats and create a single JSON file.
body_text: @ericox  Merging the JSON data is unlikely to be a good idea... it is much simpler for the master to just collect the StepStats protobufs from each worker and merge the protos (which is a single line of code!)  The Timeline code ought to just deal with the merged StepStats and create a single JSON file.
body: @ericox  Merging the JSON data is unlikely to be a good idea... it is _much_ simpler for the master to just collect the `StepStats` protobufs from each worker and merge the protos (which is a single line of code!)  The Timeline code ought to just deal with the merged `StepStats` and create a single JSON file.
